mapper.select: SELECT typecho_contents.cid, typecho_contents.title, typecho_metas.`name` AS category, FROM_UNIXTIME(typecho_contents.created, '%Y-%m-%d') AS created, SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING_INDEX(text, '<!--more-->', 1), 16) AS text FROM typecho_contents INNER JOIN typecho_relationships ON typecho_contents.cid = typecho_relationships.cid INNER JOIN typecho_metas ON typecho_metas.mid = typecho_relationships.mid WHERE typecho_metas.type = 'category' ORDER BY created DESC LIMIT #{page}, #{pageSize}

SELECT count(typecho_contents.cid) as totalCount FROM typecho_contents INNER JOIN typecho_relationships ON typecho_contents.cid = typecho_relationships.cid INNER JOIN typecho_metas ON typecho_metas.mid = typecho_relationships.mid WHERE typecho_metas.type = 'category'
